description: The iconic snow-capped mountain of Japan
quote: Your mountain is waiting, so get on your way.
author: Dr. Seuss

description: The world's largest coral reef system
quote: The sea, once it casts its spell, holds one in its net of wonder forever.
author: Jacques Cousteau

description: A steep-sided canyon carved by the Colorado River
quote: In the presence of eternity, the mountains are as transient as the clouds.
author: Robert Green Ingersoll

description: A natural light display in the Earth's sky
quote: Look at the sky. We are not alone. The whole universe is friendly to us and conspires only to give the best to those who dream and work.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: A teardrop on the cheek of time.
author: Rabindranath Tagore, on the Taj Mahal

quote: The purpose of life is to live it, to taste experience to the utmost, to reach out eagerly and without fear for newer and richer experience.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

description: A city of canals and historic architecture
quote: Travel makes one modest. You see what a tiny place you occupy in the world.
author: Gustave Flaubert

description: An ecosystem in Africa known for its wildlife
quote: The only man I envy is the man who has not yet been to Africa â€“ for he has so much to look forward to.
author: Richard Mullin

description: A series of fortifications made of stone, brick, and other materials
quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
author: Lao Tzu

description: A volcanic island known for its stunning views
quote: We travel not to escape life, but for life not to escape us.
author: Anonymous
